com.mr_apps.androidbase.custom_views

Class PasswordView

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextInputEditText
      • com.mr_apps.androidbase.custom_views.PasswordView

  • public class PasswordView
extends TextInputEditText
    Class that manages the Password View, a custom view based on the implementation of Lisa Wray This class manage a special edit text with a button that can switch between "visible password" and "hidden password"

        public void setUseStrikeThrough(boolean useStrikeThrough)
        Sets if the button should turn in the "strikethrough" version or not
        Parameters:
        useStrikeThrough - true if the button's icon should turns in the "strikethrough", false otherwise

      • setError

        public void setError(boolean error)
        Sets if the error is activated or not. When activeted, the button turns red
        Parameters:
        error - true if the error is active, false otherwise
